parameters: Return to me when you have the berry.
Ahh, excellent. I trust that retrieving the
berry was not too much trouble?
If you don't call battling slime monsters that
are impervious to your attacks trouble, then
Yes... most unexpected, Tali was able to help
Is that so? May I ask how?
Just a little creative thinking - I put
together a Brew of Burning - toasted it up
Interesting. And perhaps I can reward your
I can teach you how to manifest the element of
fire. Fire will be less effective against you,
while enemies vulnerable to fire will be more
I don't know Elim - this seems like something
we don't fully understand. It seems risky.
I'm in debt to you, so let it not be said that
I do not keep my word. Accept my offer of
training, or accept 3000 gold pieces for your
efforts. It makes no difference to me.
Excellent. Now hold still while I work my
Elim and Odan have learned Fire of Wrath!
There, our compact is complete. Feel free to
return to the Homonculus should you be in
As you wish. Take it, and be off with you.
Feel free to return to the Homonculus should
you be in further need of supplies.
You storm into my home and demand answers?
Give me one reason why I shouldn't reduce
you all to a pile of smoldering ashes right
My apologies - we are looking to explore
Stinger Swamp to find the path through to
As you can clearly see, this is not the path
through to the town. Although now that you are
here, perhaps you may be of some use...
Why do I not like where this conversation is
No need for concern - so long as you don't
cross me. You're not going to cross me are you?
No, we're not. Now quiet down the pair of you.
I sense that you're carrying something that I
I seek a special berry that grows in the swamp.
It's extremely rare. It grows on the stalks of
the nightshade bush in the western part of the
If you're as powerful as you claim, why not
venture out and get it yourself?
The swamp is a dangerous place. Powerful as I
am, it is still unsafe to travel far alone.
If we complete this task for you, what's in it
for us? We are on an urgent mission for the
King and can't afford any delays.
Come now Elim, isn't a good deed it's own
How did you know my name?
I know a lot about you. About all of you in
fact. Just because you haven't been in the
swamp, doesn't mean I don't have eyes outside
it. Morghanna keeps very well informed.
As you've no doubt guessed, I am versed in the
magical arts. Fetch me the nightshade berry,
and I will reward you appropriately.
Very well, we will do as you ask.
Are you sure this is a good idea?
Couldn't do any harm could it?
Excellent. Return to me when you have the
berry. One piece of advice - many creatures
in the swamp may poison you, so you may wish
